scripts.cdk:synth: npm run build && cdk synth --app app.js
scripts.cdk:diff: npm run build && cdk diff --app app.js
scripts.deploy:hosted-zones: npm run build && cdk deploy --app app.js --context environment=dev --context deploy-backend=false
scripts.deploy:hosted-zones:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy --app app.js Lingible-Dev-HostedZones --context environment=dev --context deploy-backend=false --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:hosted-zones:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy --app app.js Lingible-Prod-HostedZones --context environment=prod --context deploy-backend=false --require-approval any-change
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy --app app.js Lingible-Dev --context environment=dev --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy --app app.js Lingible-Prod --context environment=prod --require-approval any-change
scripts.clean: rm -rf cdk.out dist lambda-layer lambda-packages lambda-hashes.json
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
